messages.subject: International Children's Conference on the Environment
messages.msgSnippet: A friend asked me to pass this on. Tia The International Children s Conference on the Environment, which is being held in cooperation with the United Nations
messages.messageBody:
A friend asked me to pass this on.
Tia

The International Children's Conference on the Environment, which is being
held in cooperation with the United Nations Environment Programme, is still
looking for 10-12 year olds to come to the conference, May 21-25 in
Victoria. I wonder if you could put the word out to your contacts
internationally.

Web site is: http://www.icccanada2002.org

No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt
*********************************************
Tia Leschke
leschke@...
On Vancouver Island
